ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Suzanne M. Hood ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. SUZANNE M. HOOD, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), effective November 1, 2018.
